page.title: 20THE BINLEY SURVEY TEAM
page.content: The following third year pupils took part in the footslog of the survey work: A: Deborah;Sonia;Debbie;Helen. B: Warren;Mark;Alan;Andrew. C: Katherine;Jayne;Judith;Jon. D: Lorraine;Tracey;Nicola;Sacha. Research: Becky and Sharon. Slides taken by Neil and Philip. Display work by Parminda. Editorial team, Neil J.;Ian; Katie; Neil Mc.;Sharon;Darren;Mr. Morgan Computer operators, Sarbjit and Becky with help from Mr Morgan and Mr.Billington(Head of Maths Dept.) Binley Park Mixed Comprehensive school is situated on the SE edge of Coventry about 9Kms from Ryton. Our special thanks go to the Head, Miss Smith,and the staff and pupils of Ryton First School.
